message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I think it would be a valuable addition and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $10,000? I believe we could reach a fair agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000? This is a very fair offer considering the value you'll gain from the product.
